content.raw:
Ahh that's a tough one. I feel like the orange passes the idea of "active", but it might be a bit overkill. The dark on the other hand doesn't immediately give me the impression it is "inactive". This could all be just me though...

How about fading both the font color and the background  like this:

http://red-team-design.com/dist/uploads/2011/09/css3-buttons-inputs.png

I have a couple of worries about playing only with the color though:

1. It's not immediately obvious why the colors would be different in the first place, and there is no other clue to what is happening, like a tooltip or something
1. The inactive fields might end up looking "disabled", giving the impression that they can't be edited
